attributes.action: Allow the building of the new St. Helens RLFC Stadium on the site of the old United Glass works site.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition, asks for the planning permission to be allowed to build a new community based sports ground on derelict land within the town centre of St. Helens. Allowing further opportunities for the development of sport and healthy living within an already deprived area.
